  1. Description
  2. Classes and Interfaces

Package model

package model
  • Class
    Description
    AttackingState
    Implements the "Attacking" state for an enemy's state machine.
    Directions
    Represents the four cardinal directions used for movement and orientation of entities.
    Elevator
    Represents the game's elevator, managing its state, movement between floors, and position.
    EmptyTile
    Represents an empty, non-solid tile in the game world.
    Enemy
    An abstract base class for all enemy entities in the game.
    EnemyBehavior
    Defines the contract for an enemy's behavior strategy.
    EnemyFactory
    A factory class for creating different types of enemies.
    EnemyState
    Enumerates the possible states for an enemy's state machine.
    EnemyStateHandler
    Defines the contract for a specific state in an enemy's state machine.
    EnemyType
    Enumerates the different types of enemies in the game.
    Entity
    An abstract base class for all dynamic game objects, such as the player and enemies.
    FurnitureTile
    Represents an interactable piece of furniture in the game world.
    FurnitureType
    Enumerates the different types of furniture that can appear in a level.
    GameConstants
    An abstract class that holds global, static constants for the game.
    GameModel
    The central data model for the entire game.
    GameSession
    Represents the state of a single gameplay session.
    GameState
    Enumerates the possible high-level states of the game.
    IdleState
    Implements the "Idle" state for an enemy's state machine.
    Level
    Represents a single game level.
    LiftTile
    Represents a solid, vertically moving lift (elevator platform) within a level.
    MovingRobot
    Represents a mobile enemy robot that patrols an area.
    MovingRobotBehavior
    Implements the behavior context for a MovingRobot.
    MovingState
    Implements the "Moving" state for an enemy's state machine.
    PcTile
    Represents an interactable computer terminal (PC) tile in the game.
    PlatformTile
    Represents a solid platform tile that entities can stand on.
    Player
    Represents the player character controlled by the user.
    PlayerState
    Enumerates the possible states for the player character.
    StandingRobot
    Represents a stationary enemy robot that does not patrol.
    StandingRobotBehavior
    Implements the behavior context for a StandingRobot.
    Tile
    An abstract base class for all tiles that make up the game world's structure.
    TileFactory
    A factory class for creating different types of tiles.
    TileTypes
    Enumerates the different types of tiles that can exist in a game level.
    TurningState
    Implements the "Turning" state for an enemy's state machine.
    Usable
    Defines a contract for objects that can be "used" by an entity.
    UserProfile
    Represents a user's profile, storing all their progress and statistics.
    WallTile
    Represents a solid, impassable wall tile in the game world.
